speaker.name: Ryan Roggenkemper
speaker.biography: Ryan is an NLP Engineer at PayPal, primarily working on text content moderation for the Customer Success Platform. He is fairly new to the field of NLP, with just over 1 year of experience, but has a great passion for all things statistics and data science. This is his first conference appearance (but hopefully not his last!), and he is very excited to present and learn! He's also very enthusiastic about ice cream. Probably too enthusiastic...
